metadata.title: CVE-2017-2615 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Quick emulator (QEMU) built with the Cirrus CLGD 54xx VGA emulator support is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds access issue. It could occur while copying VGA data via bitblt copy in backward mode. A privileged user inside a guest could use this flaw to crash the QEMU process resulting in DoS or potentially execute arbitrary code on the host with privileges of QEMU process on the host.

notes.note: seth-arnold> apparently introduced by the fix for CVE-2014-8106

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.8+dfsg-3ubuntu2').
